siteInfo.cookieWarning: Cookie authentication uses your current login account, cannot be used for multiple accounts on the same site, do not use unless necessary

infoPanel.confirmAddInfo: Please confirm that the account information is correct before clicking the 'Confirm Add' button
infoPanel.manualInfo: Manually fill in the account information. The account will be saved securely in local storage
infoPanel.autoDetectInfo: Please log in to the target site first, the extension will automatically detect the site type and automatically get the access token
infoPanel.editInfoDesc: After modifying the account information, the system will re-verify and get the latest balance data
infoPanel.reDetectInfo: If the site information changes, it is recommended to click the 'Re-detect' button (you need to log in to the target site first by yourself)

form.exchangeRateDesc: Indicates how much RMB is needed to recharge 1 USD. The system will try to get it automatically, please fill in manually if not obtained
form.manualBalanceUsdDesc: Use this when the site cannot fetch balance/quota automatically
form.validRateError: Please enter a valid exchange rate, greater than 0
form.checkInStatus: Check-in status detection (requires the site to have check-in enabled)
form.customCheckInDesc: External check-in/welfare site URL where you can get account balance or redeem codes
form.openRedeemWithCheckIn: Also open redeem page when using external check-in
form.autoCheckInEnabledDesc: Whether this account participates in daily check-in when global auto check-in is enabled
form.tagsDescription: Use tags to categorize accounts for quick filtering
form.tagsDeleteDescription: Delete "{{name}}" globally. This will remove it from all accounts.
form.cookieAuthSessionCookieDesc: Import session cookies from the currently logged-in browser tab

messages.autoDetectTakingTooLong: Auto-detect is taking longer than expected. Open troubleshooting guide.
messages.importCookiesEmpty: No cookies found. Please log in first.
